ahmed.mumtaz52@... wrote on 14.1.2014 22:56:
> I've tried various parallel JUnit implementations such as JUnit Toolbox,
> ParallelizedParameterized, etc., but everything runs the tests in
> separate JVM processes.

I'm working on a test runner that runs tests in parallel on a single 
JVM. It's compatible with JUnit tests and it runs them so that each test 
class will run in its own thread. For more information see http://jumi.fi/

It's work in progress, but the basics of running tests in parallel are 
already there. A recent roadmap is in 
https://groups.google.com/d/msg/jumi-test-runner/BYyEfzLnX4A/fBbUqkkdHigJ of 
which feature #1 has been implemented and I'm working on features #3-5 
(though the last few months I've been too busy with my main job, so the 
progress has been slow).

--
